user.title: Select Climate Entity
user.description: Choose the climate entity to automate and decide if you want to use an external temperature sensor.

data.use_external_temp_sensor_description: Choose yes to read temperature from an external sensor instead of the climate entity.
data.use_humidity_description: Enable humidity-based automation and optional humidifier control.
data.enable_light_control_description: Toggle the AC display light before/after commands and when the automation turns on/off.
data.ac_humidity_controls_description: If your AC supports humidity control (humidify/dehumidify), enable this to configure AC behavior for both high and low humidity. Otherwise, only the humidifier will be controlled for low humidity.

sensors.title: Sensors & Accessories
sensors.description: Select external sensors and optional devices.

data.temperature_sensor_description: Optional: select an external temperature sensor to use instead of the climate entity's built-in temperature.
data.humidity_sensor_description: Optional: select an external humidity sensor to use instead of the climate entity's built-in humidity.
data.humidifier_entity_description: Optional: device that will be turned on to increase humidity (humidifier or switch). Leave blank if none.
data.light_entity: Light Entity (Required when light control is enabled)
data.light_entity_description: The entity that controls the display light or mode on your AC. Can be a light, switch, or select entity.

light_options.title: Light Select Options
light_options.description: Configure the values for the select entity when turning the light on and off.

error.entity_not_found: The specified entity was not found
error.entity_required: Entity is required when using external sensor
error.invalid_domain: Light entity must be a light, switch, or select entity

abort.already_configured: This climate entity is already configured
